message.item.tinygates.tiny_and_gate: 當兩側都接收到信號時輸出
message.item.tinygates.tiny_or_gate: 任兩側接收到信號時輸出
message.item.tinygates.tiny_xor_gate: 當兩側輸入狀態不相同時輸出
message.item.tinygates.tiny_not_gate: 輸出與輸入信號相反的信號，類似於紅石火把，但單向無延遲
message.item.tinygates.tiny_rs_latch: Outputs to front when signal on left (Set signal) is pulsed. Remains on until signal on right (Reset signal) is pulsed.
message.item.tinygates.tiny_t_flip_flop: Output to front toggles on pulse to back.
message.item.tinygates.tiny_counter:
Counts pulses received to back input (up to 15).
Displays number and outputs that signal strength to front.
Also can act as a potentiometer.
Input to left locks number.
Input to right resets counter.
message.item.tinygates.tiny_clock:
以設定的頻率向前端輸出紅石脈衝。
點擊右鍵以開啟頻率設置介面。
在後方輸入紅石信號以停用時鐘
message.item.tinygates.tiny_edge_detecto:
Outputs redstone pulse at start (rising edge) or stop (falling edge) of redstone signal to back input.
Right click to toggle edge to detect (rising or falling).
